    • Uses of Taxi in taxi.service

      Methods in taxi.service that return Taxi 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Taxi RegistrationService.createTaxi(java.lang.String carModel, java.lang.String carType, java.lang.String licensePlate, java.lang.String carModelDate, double locationLat, double locationLon)
      createTaxi method This method gets as parameters: the carModel the carType the licensePlate the carModelDate the latitude the longtitude The method: Validates the license plate Validates the car model date Creates the new taxi object and inserts it in the DB Finally it returns the new object Note: It is assumed that coordinates are fetched from GPS
      Methods in taxi.service that return types with arguments of type Taxi 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Taxi> RequestHandlingService.searchTaxi(Customer customer, int range)
      searchTaxi method This method gets as parameters: the customer object and the range in kilometers The method: Creates an empty list of Taxis to store the results of the search Creates a CoordinateCalc object, which will be used to calculate the distance between customer and taxi Fetches from the table Taxi all the taxis which are free (status = true) In case the result set is empty, the list of results has 0 elements Otherwise, the distance between customer and each taxi is calculated.
      Methods in taxi.service with parameters of type Taxi 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean RequestHandlingService.handleRequest(Request req, Taxi taxi, java.lang.String decision)
      handleRequest method This method gets as parameters: the request object made by the customer, the Taxi object with which the request is connected and the decision of the taxi driver (whether he will undertake this request or not) The method: In case the decision is 'yes": The status of the request is updated from pending to ongoing (in case it is not already canceled by the customer) The status of the taxi is updated from true (available) to false (booked) The customer is informed that his request was accepted In case the decision is "no": The status of the request is updated from pending to canceled The customer is informed that his request was denied The method returns true in case the request was accepted or false in case it was denied or any error occurred
      TaxiDriver RegistrationService.registerTaxiDriver(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String sex, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.util.Date dateOfBirth, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String city, int zipCode, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String creditCardType, java.lang.String creditCardNumber, java.lang.String expiryDate, java.lang.String ccv, Taxi owns)
      registerTaxiDriver method This method gets as parameters: the name the surname the sex the username the password the dateOfBirth the address the city the zipCode the email the creditCardType the creditCardNumber the expiryDate the ccv the taxi he owns The method: Validates username Validates password and then encrypts it Validates email Validates credit card Validates date of birth Validates that the taxi is not already defined from other driver Creates the new taxi driver object and inserts it in the DB Finally it returns the new object
      Request RequestHandlingService.startRequest(Taxi taxi, Customer customer)
      startRequest method This method gets as parameters: the taxi object selected by the customer for this request and the customer object The method: Uses the current date as the date that the request was made Creates a request with that date, the taxi and the customer and inserts it to the DB Fetches from the table TaxiDriver the taxi driver to whom the given taxi belongs Informs taxi driver for this request The created request is returned
      boolean RequestHandlingService.stopRequest(Request req, Taxi taxi, float cost, int duration)
      stopRequest method This method gets as parameters: the request object made by the customer, the taxi object which handled the request, the cost of the route and the duration of the route The method: Is called when the route has finished It changes the status of the taxi from false (booked) to true (free) It updates the status of the request to done It updates the cost and the duration of the route (got from within the request object) It calculates the commission for this route And finally the customer is informed about the final cost and is asked to evaluate the service Returns true in case everything went ok

    • Uses of Taxi in taxi.utils

      Methods in taxi.utils with parameters of type Taxi 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean Validators.validateTaxi(Taxi taxi)
      validateTaxi method This method is used for validating that a taxi is not already defined.
